about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner in Maritime Industry
about.description: Eray Ship Supply is one of the leading companies in the Tuzla Ship Supply sector, located in the strategic Tuzla shipyard region of Istanbul. With our wide product range and expertise in fasteners and hardware, we add value to the maritime industry. We are your reliable partner for all kinds of connection elements and technical materials, combining our speed in ship supply services with our experience in the field. Our company operating in the Tuzla area maintains the highest standards of reliability and quality in the maritime sector.
about.description2: Our company operating in the {{location}} area maintains the highest standards of {{reliability}} and {{quality}} in the maritime sector.
